title: How to share music on Instagram - Quora

response.answer_text: Instagram is essentially the most visual social media platform - images and videos play a much bigger role there than, for example, on Facebook. Therefore, you need to provide good video content for your track, create a video with this music before uploading to Instagram. To avoid content yourself, you can use content under various types of creative commons licenses: Videos - Creative Commons You can also significantly increase Instagram views by adapting your video formats to the platform - because Instagram uses very different (square and vertical) formats as compared to TV or Youtube. So, it is better to reformat your video into portrait (vertical) orientation before uploading it to Instagram or IGTV. The easiest way to do this is using online tools.For example, Tappable Vertical Video Maker - Crop & Blur Videos To Fit Social Media is a free tool that converts horizontal video content into a vertical one. 1080X1080, 1080x1350 (4:5), 1080x1920 (9:16) vertical video formats are supported for output.It is mostly focused on content creators and videographers to create better video content for Instagram and IGTV.

There is only one way you can add music to your content on Instagram and that is to use the Instagram Music sticker. The Instagram Story Music sticker was released in June 2018. It’s a fun way to add some audible flair to your Stories, though not everyone has access yet. If the Instagram music feature hasn’t been rolled out to you yet, or if you’re in a country that doesn’t support it, not to worry! Will show you how to add music to an Instagram Story without the sticker in the next section. We’ll dive into the instructions in more details below, but here’s a quick step by step to get you started: Create a new Instagram StoryTap the sticker icon at the top of the screenTap to select the Music sticker iconSelect a songChoose the portion of the song you want to playTap “Done” to add the song to your story
